messages.content: Hi! I have a booking for tape extensions on the 25th. Can I change it to the 26th instead?
Hi Jessica! Let me check availability for the 26th. Which time slot works best for you?
Morning would be perfect, around 10am if possible?
Great news! Lisa has an opening at 10:00 on the 26th. I've updated your booking. See you then!
Thank you so much! Quick question - should I wash my hair before I come in?
Hello! I'm interested in weft extensions. How long do they typically last?
Hi Thandi! Weft extensions typically last 8-12 weeks with proper care. We recommend maintenance every 6-8 weeks to keep them looking their best.
That sounds great! And what's the price range?
Weft installation starts at R3,200 which includes the service. Hair quality varies - we have options from R1,500 to R4,000 depending on length and quality. Would you like to book a free consultation?
Yes please! I've just booked for the 25th with Sarah. Thank you!
Hi, I think I'm due for maintenance on my tape extensions. They're starting to slip a bit near the front.
Hi Chloe! Thanks for reaching out. When did you last have them installed? Slipping can happen if they're past the 6-week mark or if there's product buildup.
It's been about 7 weeks now. I try to avoid oils near the roots but maybe I missed some spots.
7 weeks is definitely time for maintenance! I'd recommend coming in soon. Maya has availability tomorrow at 2pm - would that work?
Perfect! I've just booked it. Also, do you sell the extension-safe shampoo in store?
And the leave-in conditioner you recommended last time?
Just wanted to say thank you for the amazing tape extensions! Lisa did such a beautiful job!
Thank you so much for the kind words, Priya! We're thrilled you love your new extensions! Don't forget to leave us a review - you'll earn 25 loyalty points!
Just left a 5-star review! The whole experience was wonderful. I'll definitely be back for maintenance!
Hi! I'm getting married in December and I booked tape extensions for the 29th. Can we do a trial run first to make sure the color matches perfectly?

Congratulations on your upcoming wedding, Samantha! A color consultation is a great idea. Emma is our color matching expert - I can book you a free 30-minute consultation before your extension appointment. Would the 27th work?
The 27th is perfect! What time is available?
Also, do you have experience with bridal hair styling? I might need help on the wedding day too.
Hi there! I've been coming for wefts but I'm thinking of trying tape extensions instead. What's the difference in terms of maintenance?

Great question Nicole! Tapes are lighter and quicker to install (about 2 hours vs 3.5 for wefts). They need repositioning every 6-8 weeks. Wefts give more volume but take longer. Both need similar care - avoiding oils at the roots and using sulfate-free products.
Interesting! I think I'll stick with wefts for now since I love the volume, but maybe try tapes next time. Booked for the 27th!
Hello! I booked a facial for the 27th. I have very sensitive skin - is there anything I should know beforehand?

Hi Zinhle! Thanks for letting us know. Maya will be doing your facial and she's amazing with sensitive skin. She'll do a patch test first and use our hypoallergenic products. Please arrive without makeup if possible, and let her know about any specific allergies or products that have caused reactions before.
Perfect, thank you! I'll add a note about my rosacea when I check in. Looking forward to it!
Hi, I'm a VIP member and I wanted to check if my 20% discount will be applied to my booking on the 30th?

Hi Busisiwe! Yes absolutely - as a Platinum member, your 20% discount is automatically applied to all services. Your weft installation will be R2,560 instead of R3,200. We've also got a special VIP gift waiting for you!
Amazing! You guys always take such good care of me. See you on the 30th!
Hi! I just booked weft extensions for December 2nd as a birthday treat to myself! So excited!
I was wondering - do you have any birthday specials or discounts?
Also, I've never had extensions before. Is there anything I should do to prepare?
Absolutely love my new wefts! Sarah is incredible - the blending is perfect!
So happy to hear that Chantel! Sarah really is talented. Remember to use the silk pillowcase we recommended - it'll help keep those wefts tangle-free while you sleep!
Already ordered one! Thanks for the tip. See you in 6 weeks for maintenance!
